title: [Placements]Wtf is that ibm isdl shortlist 350?!?!?!
content: Saw people whom I know are cheating and till now havent even got 1 interview suddenly making it to the shortlist. So basically now cheating is the only way?!?!?. People with 7 gpa and till now cheated have got shortlisted . My friend who cheated and solved both the questions has got while I did both the questions on my own and did not get. This is so unfair man why tf cant they conduct it offline?. Is there anyone here who did bth the questions dsa but still hasnt got shortlisted?

comments.body: Unrelated but did you get EY test link ? In my class few people got who have lesser GPA than me.(ECE )

Well, IBM shortlisting is very random  
Their recruitment is also is very math.random
When did ppl get it. No one I know has received it yet

It happens man. Last year when IBM had come to campus and had conducted tests, there were around 4 sets or so. One set extremely easy. Everyone solved both the questions from that set but none of them were shortlisted for the interviews. If you had solved even one question in the remaining other sets, you would have been shortlisted. So yeah. it all depends on your luck

Cheating in placements has always been the only working way to get placed. It's an unfortunate fact for us to just digest and move on.

Even worse fact : we can never get to see if karma will actually fuck them up or not
EY hasn't sent a test link yet. I'm keeping a close eye on it.

>till now haven't got 1 interview

I mean everyone has to not have gotten an interview, and then "suddenly" make the interview list
Bruh the whole friend group has made it at the same time🙏😭
